result.translation: Amaboko yombi ya Abu Lahab[1] arakorama (kubera ko yayakoreshaga abangamira Intumwa y’Imana), ndetse na we ubwe azorame.
result.footnotes: [1]  Abu Lahab yari se wabo w’Intumwa Muhamadi, akaba yari umwe mu banzi bakomeye b’idini rya Isilamu, barwanyije bakanatoteza Intumwa Muhamadi.
